title: A discourse of that which happened in the battell fought betweene the two navies of Spaine and Portugall, at the Ilands of the Azores. Anno Dom. 1582
author: Bazan, Álvaro de, marquês de Santa Cruz, 1526-1588.
publisher: By Thomas Purfoote, and are to be sould at his shop ouer-against Saint Sepulchers Church without Newgate,
